data.lyric:
[ti:Steal My Love]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Good Things]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Steal My Love - Dan + Shay
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Dan Smyers/Andy Albert/Ashley Gorley/Jordan Reynolds
[00:00.69]Ain't no way nobody gonna steal my love
[00:03.39]
[00:04.17]My love
[00:05.51]
[00:06.16]Can't take my eyes off you
[00:08.27]
[00:08.86]Even if I wanted to
[00:11.46]I swear I'm staring at heaven
[00:14.96]
[00:16.82]Holding you here tonight
[00:18.91]
[00:19.46]Watching all the stars align
[00:22.14]I wanna stay for forever
[00:25.57]
[00:26.58]Yeah the sky could be falling
[00:29.21]The world could unravel
[00:32.15]But you'll still be safe in my arms
[00:35.66]
[00:37.81]Ain't no way nobody gonna steal my love
[00:40.85]
[00:41.41]My love
[00:42.91]No way no how no never
[00:44.78]
[00:45.45]My heart is yours forever
[00:47.70]If I couldn't call you mine
[00:49.43]Then baby you know I don't want no one
[00:53.47]My car my clothes my money
[00:55.43]
[00:56.00]Take it all but there ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[00:59.45]My love my love my love my love
[01:02.71]Ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[01:04.75]Tattoo your name on me
[01:07.36]So I can wear it on my sleeve
[01:10.07]Make sure that everyone knows it
[01:14.19]'Cause baby you're the one thing that I can't live without
[01:18.42]You kiss me and there ain't a doubt
[01:21.13]No changing my mind I'm in it for life
[01:25.96]Ain't no way nobody gonna steal my love
[01:28.73]
[01:29.43]My love
[01:30.87]No way no how no never
[01:32.83]
[01:33.37]My heart is yours forever
[01:35.70]If I couldn't call you mine
[01:37.57]Then baby you know I don't want no one
[01:41.41]My car my clothes my money
[01:43.46]
[01:44.02]Take it all but there ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[01:47.47]My love my love my love my love
[01:50.80]Ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[01:52.75]My love my love my love my love
[01:55.69]
[01:57.60]As long as stars are dancing 'round the moon
[02:01.81]
[02:02.76]There'll never be a me without you
[02:06.78]
[02:08.62]Ain't no way nobody gonna steal my love
[02:11.48]
[02:12.12]My love
[02:13.48]No way no how no never
[02:15.51]
[02:16.08]My heart is yours forever
[02:18.36]If I couldn't call you mine
[02:20.07]Then baby you know I don't want no one
[02:24.26]My car my clothes my money
[02:26.16]
[02:26.67]Take it all but there ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[02:30.09]My love my love my love my love
[02:33.38]Ain't nobody gonna steal my love
[02:35.39]My love my love my love my love
[02:38.74]Ain't nobody gonna steal my love
data.trans:
[ti:Steal My Love]
[ar:Dan + Shay]
[al:Good Things]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.69]没有人能够骗走我的爱
[00:03.39]
[00:04.17]我的绵绵情意
[00:05.51]
[00:06.16]我的视线无法从你身上移开
[00:08.27]
[00:08.86]即使我想如此
[00:11.46]我发誓我仿佛瞥见天堂
[00:14.96]
[00:16.82]今夜于此将你拥入怀中
[00:18.91]
[00:19.46]遥看群星闪耀
[00:22.14]我渴望这一刻永远持续
[00:25.57]
[00:26.58]或许天崩地裂
[00:29.21]或许天翻地覆
[00:32.15]但在我的怀中 你永远会安然无恙
[00:35.66]
[00:37.81]没有人能骗走我的爱人
[00:40.85]
[00:41.41]我的爱人
[00:42.91]无论如何绝不可能 
[00:44.78]
[00:45.45]我的心永远属于你
[00:47.70]若我不能唤你为我爱人
[00:49.43]那么宝贝 你知道除了你我谁都不想要
[00:53.47]我所有身外物
[00:55.43]
[00:56.00]全都可以拿走 但没有人能骗走我的爱
[00:59.45]我的绵绵情意
[01:02.71]没有人能骗走我的爱人
[01:04.75]在我肌肤纹上你的姓名
[01:07.36]所以我能对你敞开心扉
[01:10.07]让所有人知道我对你的情意
[01:14.19]因为宝贝若没有你 我便难以为继
[01:18.42]当你轻吻我时 毫无疑问
[01:21.13]我的心意绝不改变 我会用一生守护你
[01:25.96]没有人能骗走我的爱人
[01:28.73]
[01:29.43]我的爱人
[01:30.87]无论如何绝不可能 
[01:32.83]
[01:33.37]我的心永远属于你
[01:35.70]若我不能唤你为我爱人
[01:37.57]那么宝贝 你知道除了你我谁都不想要
[01:41.41]我所有身外物
[01:43.46]
[01:44.02]全都可以拿走 但没有人能骗走我的爱
[01:47.47]我的绵绵情意
[01:50.80]没有人能骗走我的爱人
[01:52.75]我的爱人
[01:55.69]
[01:57.60]只要星月交辉
[02:01.81]
[02:02.76]我们就会永远相伴
[02:06.78]
[02:08.62]没有人能够骗走我的爱
[02:11.48]
[02:12.12]我的绵绵情意
[02:13.48]无论如何绝不可能 
[02:15.51]
[02:16.08]我的心永远属于你
[02:18.36]若我不能唤你为我爱人
[02:20.07]那么宝贝 你知道除了你我谁都不想要
[02:24.26]我所有身外物
[02:26.16]
[02:26.67]全都可以拿走 但没有人能骗走我的爱
[02:30.09]我的绵绵情意
[02:33.38]没有人能骗走我的爱人
[02:35.39]我的爱人
[02:38.74]没有人能骗走我的爱人
